title: Top Places to Visit in Bareilly, Uttar Pradesh
content: Bareilly (/bəˈrɛli/ (About this sound listen)) is a city in Bareilly district in the northern Indian state of Uttar Pradesh. Located on the Ramganga, it is the capital of Bareilly division and the geographical region of Rohilkhand. The city is 252 kilometres (157 mi) north of the state capital, L
